name: Incident Response Management using Machine Learning
desc: Studied different ML (Machine Learning) algorithms and checked their efficiency for Incident Response Management. This is one step towards automation of cybersecurity.

name: Directory Cloaking with Webcam Security
desc: Designed python code which will capture a photo of an unauthorized person while accessing our personal Directory and not only help in protecting personal directories but also track the unauthorized user.

name: Color Detection for Colour Blind People
desc: There are millions of colors but many of the people cannot differentiate them. This is solution to this problem and will help color blind people to recognize different colors.
